meanings.definition: A derivative of sulfanilamide, used as an antimicrobial agent.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed a sulfonamide to treat the infection.
meanings.sent2: Sulfonamides are commonly used to fight bacterial infections.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria threw a party, but the sulfonamide crashed it!
meanings.sent4: The sulfonamide acted like a shield, protecting the body from harmful bacteria.
meanings.sent5: In the battle against infection, the sulfonamide emerged as the hero.

meanings.definition: Any of a class of synthetic drugs that contain the sulfonamide group.
meanings.sent1: My friend is allergic to drugs containing sulfonamide.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often prescribe sulfonamide drugs for various infections.
meanings.sent3: The sulfonamide group in the medicine had a dance party in my body!
meanings.sent4: Her words were like sulfonamide drugs, fighting off negativity.
meanings.sent5: The sulfonamide group in the medication worked tirelessly to combat the illness.
